job.title: Software Engineer II
job.industry: Electrical/Electronic Manufacturing,Mechanical or Industrial Engineering,Medical Devices
job.description: At Midmark Digital Diagnostics, we develop ECG, spirometry, and vital sign devices used by physicians and nurses. We are now looking for a talented senior software developer who wants to help us deliver great medical software. We build applications that interface with diagnostic devices and connect to a wide variety of healthcare systems. We are using .NET, C#, as well as Angular and Typescript. We work in cross-functional teams and we like agile, continuous delivery and automation.  We are now looking for a talented software developer that can help us take software development to the next level. Bachelorâ€™s degree in Computer Engineering or Computer Science, Electrical Engineering or related field required and 3 - 5 years of experience in a related field preferred . Midmark is the only clinical environment design and manufacturing company that enables a better care experience at the point of care in medical, dental and animal health. By harmonizing space, technologies and workflows, we enhance interactions between patients and caregivers resulting in more efficient care and better outcomes. By living our corporate values, our 2,000 teammates worldwide make this possible.  EO/AA Employer Minorities/Females/Protected Veterans/Disabled
